definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: the massive foot stomps down where he just was.
sentences.chinese: 机甲硕大的脚重重地踏在他刚才的位置上。

sentences.english: Tiny models could be used as spies while gargantuan versions served as mobile armor.
sentences.chinese: 微小的型号能用于侦察，而巨型版本可充当移动机甲。

sentences.english: The Chopper VX is a very lightly armored Transformer.
sentences.chinese: VX机甲是非常轻装甲的变形体。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the ragtag crew has nightmarish encounters with skitters and mechs.
sentences.chinese: 同时，乌合之众船员恶梦般的遭遇很快和机甲。

sentences.english: It follows him into a narrow rocky cleft.
sentences.chinese: 机甲跟着jake进入一个岩石裂缝。

sentences.english: Two RoboThespians interact with one another.
sentences.chinese: 两个“机甲演员”彼此进行互动。

sentences.english: The one thing that's plaguing most of the mecha downside.
sentences.chinese: 没有这东西使所有的机甲都不能起飞。

sentences.english: Josh reaches into the cockpit of the powersuit and hits the fire control button.
sentences.chinese: Jake把手伸进机甲的驾驶舱狂按火力控制按钮。

sentences.english: Try to draw off as many of their mecha as we can.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量多地吸引他们的机甲。

sentences.english: Scrin has the massive advantage when it comes to husk capturing and support.
sentences.chinese: 当占领和支援机甲外壳时，Scrin有巨大的优势。

sentences.english: A commando can also be effective for wiping out Walkers and dealing with Infantry.
sentences.chinese: 特种兵可以非常有效得清掉机甲和对付步兵。

sentences.english: Then tons of rock come crashing down, smashing it into junk.
sentences.chinese: 数吨重的岩石轰然倒坍，被机甲碎成垃圾。

sentences.english: Hidden hunters hit it with their bolos.
sentences.chinese: 隐藏的猎人们用刀砍向机甲。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
